body.title: Project goal
body.text:
The goal of this project is to use and implement online photo sharing API platforms. We created a search and navigation application for photos on the following platform: Imgur.

This project was completed in the 3rd year of Eptech and initiated us to mobile development with Kotlin.

body.title: Features of our application
body.text:
• Login page - To connect to an Imgur account
  • Feed page - To scroll through random images and descriptions from Imgur
  • Favorites page - To scroll through images and descriptions that are saved as favorites
  • Account page - To see information from your Imgur account and log out
  • Import button - To import images from the phone
